AthleHub

Community sports platform for coordination, tracking, and recognition

üîÑ Building 2/6 Features
30%
üìñ

The Backstory

Growing up, basketball was a big part of my life. I‚Äôd go out with my friends to play pickup games, but we kept running into the same frustrating problems:

Sometimes I‚Äôd get to the court and find it completely empty. Other times, I‚Äôd hear about a pickup event or mini-league too late. During games, scores were lost, or stats weren‚Äôt tracked. Even in small leagues, records disappeared after the event ended.

And I realized‚Äîthese weren‚Äôt just basketball issues. Friends who played football, volleyball, or badminton all faced the same challenges: lack of coordination, missing data, no way to build lasting recognition.

üí°

The Solution

AthleHub is a sports-first social hub that makes playing, tracking, and experiencing sports seamless.

  • Know when and where to play with location-based match and event system
  • Record and track stats so every point, goal, or ace counts
  • Stay connected with your community through feeds, chat rooms, and events
  • Recognize performance with badges, leaderboards, and progression systems
  • Enable credibility for teams, players, and businesses to build visibility
üéØ

The Mission

To digitize grassroots sports and give athletes, communities, and organizations the same tools for recognition and engagement that professionals have ‚Äî but accessible, fun, and social.

üì≤

What AthleHub Offers

Live Score Ticker

‚úÖ

Real-time sports score tracking widget with WebSocket integration

‚úÖ

Team creation, roster management, and scheduling system

Target: 2025-11-15

‚è≥

Target: 2025-12-01

Stats Dashboard

‚è≥

Comprehensive analytics and performance tracking dashboard

Target: 2025-12-15

‚è≥

Target: 2026-01-01
üöÄ

Why Now?

The grassroots sports community is massive but underserved by technology. While professional sports have sophisticated tracking and engagement tools, amateur athletes are stuck with group chats, spreadsheets, and memory.

Post-pandemic, there‚Äôs a renewed focus on community and physical activity. People want to get back to playing sports, but they need better tools to coordinate and stay engaged. AthleHub bridges the gap between casual pickup games and organized sports, making every game count.

üìÖ
